summary: Stand-alone alternative to Dark Brotherhood Light Armor or Robes.
descriptionHtml:
This is a stand-alone armor re-skin of the Master's Robes to fit in better with other Dark Brotherhood attire.

I often play Battle Mages that wear armor and usually mod myself some armored robes to go with it because it looks good. At least, better than the skin-tight leather suit would for a mage-type.

But the default Master's robes just aren't dark enough, so I did a retexture to get them more in line with the DB textures. It looks much better in my opinion.

Main File contains the meshes and original 2048 textures with simple Brotherhood Coloring.
Optional File contains higher resolution 4096 textures with more detail added, but screams "I am a Dark Brotherhood Assassin for sure."
[center][color=grey]___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center]
Light Armor Variants are craftable in the GLASS Section of the forge.
Enchanted and non-enchanted version available. Craftable and upgradeable.
Requires Glass Crafting and Arcane Enhancement Perks.
Unenchanted requires 1 leather, 3 leather strips, 2 moonstone ingot and 4 malachite ingot to craft.
Enchanted requires that, plus 1 deadra heart, fire salt, frost salt and void salt.
[center][color=grey]___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center]
0 Armor Clothing Variants are craftable in the MISC Section of the forge.
Enchanted and non-enchanted version available. Craftable and upgradeable.
Requires no pre-requisite armor perk and may require Arcane Enhancement Perk.
Unenchanted requires 1 leather, 3 leather strips to craft.
Enchanted requires that, plus 1 deadra heart, fire salt, frost salt and void salt.
[center][color=grey]___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center]
The Enchantment for both variants is the College Master Destruction, which increases Destruction spell damage by 22% and Mana Regeneration by 150%.
Just my personal preference. I might make a custom enchant later.

They are also properly tagged, so they should be properly compatible with SkyRe.

[color=#999999]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/color]
